name: Jiaming Gu (顾家铭)
description:
Biography: I'm a Ph.D. student at [Tsinghua University](https://www.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/) and now working in the [Systems and Ubiquitous Networking (SUN) group](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/), advised by [Yuan He](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/members/YuanHe/). I will receive my B.S. degree from Tsinghua University in 2024.

Research Interests: Wireless Networking, Low power IoT, Wireless Sensing
